text:
12) Eating garlic does NOT help prevent infection w/ the virus.
13) People of ALL ages can be infected by 2019-nCoV. OLDER people & w/ pre-existing medical conditions (asthma, diabetes, ❤️ disease etc) may be more vulnerable to becoming severely ill. https://t.co/eqpK5jypk1
